title: Spoil Me On The Sheet, Mr. CEO! - Novel Updates
tags: Affair   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Slow Romance
author: 养宠物的女孩
description:
Lu Yichen was an intern journalist of a company; For getting the job offer, she would try all means to stalk Ye Tang, who was a famous young CEO in the city, all because she wanted to get his latest gossip, while her leader didn't accept her draft every time.
After her investigation, it turned out that Ye Tang was exactly the big boss of her company!
As expected, she was taken by two bodyguards in a suit in front of all the colleagues...
Looking at Ye Tang standing in front of the floor-to-ceiling window, Lu Yichen trembled...>
